name: GetBoardMemberInfo
description:
Retrieve details about a specific board member.

Use this tool to get information about a specific member of a Miro board, including details necessary for collaboration and management. This should be called when you need to access a board member's data for a given board on Miro.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board to which the board member belongs.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board to which the board member belongs.

parameters.name: board_member_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board member whose role you want to retrieve on a specific board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board member whose role you want to retrieve.
